long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gamabot is a general-purpose clan-assisting program built for https://ev.io/.

Gamabot can look at all users currently in your clan and decide who should or should not be deployed based on who was the most recently active.
(Click the button labelled "Gamabot" in your clan's edit page to run this.)

Gamabot prevents your clan from being deleted by removing the delete button entirely and redirecting to the clan's view page if that somehow fails.

With Gamabot, you can use https://ev.io/profile to get your current user profile link or add someone's username to get their user profile link (example: https://ev.io/profile/IzzyGama).

Gamabot will add buttons that aren't normally available, such as "Invitations" on the profile page.

Updates: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1tlc2Jxx1-zyXdNIOXXaUvORQD2f2Mo-LLZeoHS-Ztkg/edit?usp=sharing

Discord: Gama#2191
